## AccountManager class

An account manager - to fetch and manage all the RIOT accounts.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class AccountManager implements BaseManager<Account> 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [BaseManager](./shieldbow.basemanager.md)<!-- -->&lt;[Account](./shieldbow.account.md)

|  [cache](./shieldbow.accountmanager.cache.md) |  | Collection&lt;string, [Account](./shieldbow.account.md)<!-- -->&gt; | The accounts cached in the memory. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
